籤詩版本二:
Semuenzaniso, kana zuva rechitatu, rechina, kana rechishanu remwedzi wemwedzi risisipo, hafu haipo, hafu iripo, uye isina kukwana.
Kumirira snack yepakati pehusiku pazuva regumi nemashanu regore, zvese zvinopenya uye zvizere
詩意:
Mune iyi hexagram, mwedzi unoshaikwa asi hauna kuzara.
Shivirira pazvinhu zvose.
解曰: Gara wakangwarira uye mirira. Kufanana nemwedzi wekutanga wemwedzi. Kumirira nguva yekutenderera. Hapana chakaipa.
籤詩故事一:
◇Li Yuan akakwira pachigaro
Mumakore ekupedzisira eSui Dynasty, Emperor Yang weSui Dynasty aive nehuwori uye asina kugadzikana, achinakidzwa kwese kwese, zvichikonzera hasha pakati pevanhu uye kupatsanura humambo pakati pemagamba.
Muna 618 AD, Yu Wenhuaji, Sima Dekan, Pei Qantong nevamwe vakatanga mhirizhonga yekuuraya Emperor Yang weSui Dynasty uye vakazivisa Yang Hao samambo.
Nenguva isipi Yu Wenhuaji akauraya Qin Wanghao uye akazviti Emperor Xu, achisimbisa nyika Xu.
Gore rakatevera, akaparadzwa pamwe chete nemukuru weTang Li Shentong uye Xia mambo Dou Jiande.
Mushure mekunge nzvimbo yeCentral Plains yaziva nezverufu rwaMambo Yang, Luoyang murindi Wang Shichong akatsigira Mambo Dong weYue samambo, kureva Emperor Ai weSui Dynasty.
Panguva ino, Li Yuan akabvisa Yang You, akazvizivisa samambo muTaiyuan, uye akachinja zita renyika kuti Tang. Uyu ndiTang Gaozu.
聖意: Mhuri nemba vanozvishuvira rombo rakanaka muchirimo nematsutso, tsvagai hupfumi, chengetai madhiri, mirira nguva, muchato wanonoka, Liujia anozvara musikana, vanofamba netsoka vanovharirwa, makonye anogadzikana, zvipfuyo zvakatsiga, it. zvakaoma kuwana vanhu, mhosva dzevanhu uye kutama kunochengetedza, pfuma yakarasika yakaoma, kurwara kwakaoma kuisa, kutumira kuguva regomo, uye kuchinja.
